joinNow.note: Label for the button that joins a meeting.

joinMuted.note: Label for the button that joins a meeting muted.

joinAsViewer.note: Label for the button that joins a meeting as a viewer.

noneAreHere.note: Message displayed during preview when no one is in the meeting/stage.

oneIsHere.note: Message displayed during preview when one participant is in the meeting/stage.

twoAreHere.note: Message displayed during preview when two participants are in the meeting/stage.

threeAreHere.note: Message displayed during preview when three participants are in the meeting/stage.

fourAreHere.note: Message displayed during preview when four participants are in the meeting/stage.

manyAreHere.note: Message displayed during preview when five or more participants are in the meeting/stage.
